options.description: Do not report SNPs from alignments with an ambiguous mapping, i.e. only report SNPs where the [R] and [Q] columns equal 0 and do not output these columns
Do not print the output header
Include sequence length information in the output
Sort output lines by query IDs and SNP positions
Sort output lines by reference IDs and SNP positions
Specify which alignments to report by passing 'show-coords' lines to stdin
Include x characters of surrounding SNP context in the output, default 0
